subTitle: Dive into the following questions to gain insights into the powerful features that TAR Anayltics offers and how it can elevate your toolkit.

faqs.question: What is so special about TARs application?
faqs.answer: Reach out and ask. We will show you why our software is a top tier product and will help speed up your daily inspections.

faqs.question: How to install the software?
faqs.answer: Contact our support team for a seamless transition.

faqs.question: Does your software come with customer support?
faqs.answer: Get in touch with us to discuss your needs, and we'll provide a tailored structure.

faqs.question: What do I need to start?
faqs.answer: All our customers receive dedicated email support. With the Starter Kit, you'll receive our standard support, while the Professional Toolbox plan upgrades you to priority support, meaning faster response times and specialized assistance.

faqs.question: Is there a trial period for the software?
faqs.answer: We regularly update our online resources and tutorials to reflect the latest trends in DIY and inspections, as well as introductions to new tools and techniques. Our material aims to be comprehensive and user-friendly for all skill levels.

faqs.question: Can this software be customized? Can new integrations be requested and added?
faqs.answer: Yes, our Enterprise Solutions are designed for larger companies requiring comprehensive services. We provide consultation, planning, and supply of high-grade tools and materials, as well as staffing solutions for substantial construction needs. Contact us for a customized quote.
